about_the_game:
Hello, kids! Finally, our game finally landed on the Steam page.
Ok, let me briefly introduce the basic gameplay and content of our game

Game play;
As the owner of a bakery, the player uses a mixing bowl in the back kitchen to mix ingredients, which are processed to create foods with categories and flavor attributes.
After entering the store scene, there will be small animal guests to visit, and small animals also have their own favorite food tastes and categories.
Small animals will preferentially choose foods that meet their own tastes, and whenever a small animal chooses a food that contains its own preferred attributes, it will pay you more consumption and even intimacy.
The more intimate the player is with the animal, the more items related to the animal can be unlocked, and the player can freely edit the character map of the animal.
There are also stickers that can be collected into the character book as decorations.
Each animal has its own storyline and comic, waiting for you to unlock it step by step!!

short_description: This is a simulation management game for baking bread. You need to earn more coins by continuously selling bread to animals customer, thus unlocking more types of ingredients and other rarer animals.Unlock more of their stories and collect items as well as stickers to learn the stories behind them.
